dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Alas, it appears that we must involve ourselves in this matter.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Thus it is a morning like any other, its patterns forever unchanging. If you have a matter concerning a contract, please make yourself comfortable in our office.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Hmm... Half a day remains. How do you fare?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
Though it may appear pitiable that I am working so late into the night... it is not entirely unideal, as it signifies that there is work to be done.
Many Offices in this city oft go days with nary a proper contract.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
An official contract must first be drafted and signed, if we are to accept a request.
Well... there is no need to be intimidated. It is but a simple covenant betwixt two entities.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
Big Sister is... occupied with an outside business at the moment. If there are any words you must pass on to her, you may say them unto me.
... Asking for her contact information... may be unwise. I can speak with certitude that she is not in an ideal state to engage in dialogue.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
You ask of this weapon? It is a handicraft of a workshop, indeed.
Modifications...? Hmm, why would there be a need for modifications? I do not see myself tampering with its build, either.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Contracts from Associations and contracts from Wings carry entirely different levels of significance. To be contracted by a Wing is to have our competency acknowledged.
Thus, this contract from R Corp. is also... something of grave importance.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
While I do have my reservations... I also understand that it may be a marvelous opportunity.
I am hopeful that we should be able to fulfill this contract as long as I prove to be a sufficient support for Big Sister.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: I shall use this downtime to catalogue our documents. One must not idle... in times such as these.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Hm. This is quite the responsibility. I shall try my best to live up to your expectations.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Departure, is it? Allow me to accompany you.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Let this be a positive experience for us all.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: The situation has hitherto been quite... ideal.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Stay calm.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: This is an opportunity.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ach...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: There was naught to worry.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: ...I expected as little from myself.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: It appears that my gamble bore fruit.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: ... I have miscalculated the risks of this gamble.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: ... The contract is fulfilled. Let us make ourselves scarce before further trouble finds us.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Presuming that we remain steady, a contract of such caliber should pose no difficulty to us.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: I've made far too many mistakes... I apologize. I was of no help to you.
